# torchtabular

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

A package for training SAINT and TabTransformer variant models in R using {torch}.

## Installation

You can install torchtabular from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cmcmaster1/torchtabular")
```

## Example

See the vignette.
